description: Nova-volume runs a series of commands when creating and destroying volumes, and doesn't roll back or retry on failure.  This means that volumes can get stuck in an intermediate state and can't be cleaned up / fixed without shell commands on the host.
title: volume creation doesn't recover from failure well
